description: Work Visa (Decreto Flussi) & Digital Nomad Visa. Note: 2025 Quotas are open.

meta.min_funds_requirement: **Digital Nomad:** ~28,000 EUR/year income. **Work Visa:** Salary as per contract (CCNL standards).

add.title: Nulla Osta (Work Authorization)
add.description: Original Work Authorization issued by the 'Sportello Unico per l'Immigrazione' (SUI) in Italy. This is the most critical document.

add.title: Digital Nomad Evidence
add.description: Proof of remote work (contracts), annual income >28,000 EUR, and health insurance (30k EUR coverage).

steps_flow.title: Choose Path: Work Visa vs Digital Nomad
steps_flow.description:
**Work Visa:** Employer applies for Nulla Osta (Decreto Flussi quotas).
**Digital Nomad:** Apply directly if you meet income/remote work criteria.

steps_flow.title: Employer Applies for Nulla Osta (Work Visa only)
steps_flow.description: Your employer in Italy submits the request to the Immigration Office (SUI) during 'Click Days' (Feb/Oct 2025).

steps_flow.title: Receive Nulla Osta
steps_flow.description: Once approved, the SUI sends the Nulla Osta to the employer and the Italian Consulate in your country.

steps_flow.title: Book Appointment
steps_flow.description: Book a National Visa appointment at VFS Global.

steps_flow.title: Submit Application
steps_flow.description: Submit the visa application with the Nulla Osta (or Digital Nomad docs) within 6 months of issuance.
